thread.title: First Ever Staten Island-Newark Airport Bus Service To Launch September 24
thread.title_full: First Ever Staten Island-Newark Airport Bus Service To Launch September 24 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: First Ever Staten Island-Newark Airport Bus Service To Launch September 24
text:
TransportAzumah
BROOKLYN, N.Y. , Sept. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- TransportAzumah, a regional bus company, is starting a new bus service between Staten Island and Newark Liberty International Airport on Thursday, September 24, 2015 . This service represents the first time that Staten Islanders have had a mass transit connection directly to Newark Airport. The new service, the TAZ 100, provides 14 round trips per day from the following three points on Staten Island :
Route 100 Bus Stop
Mass transit connections
Huguenot SIR Station
Staten Island Railway, X17, X19, X23, X24
Outerbridge Park & Ride
X17, X22
West Shore Expressway â€“ Victory Boulevard
S62, S92, X11, X19, X22
Free parking is also available at the Outerbridge Park & Ride, conveniently located at the south end of the Korean War Veterans Parkway and the West Shore Expressway.
The Route 100 service fills a critical need for Staten Island residents. The Port Authority's annual profile of departing passengers indicates that 1.4% of Newark Airport users originate in Staten Island , representing a market size of almost 500,000 passengers per year. A larger number of Staten Islanders used both LGA (1.9%) and JFK (1.5%) than Newark in 2014. It is likely that with this new service, Newark will become the airport of choice for Staten Island .
Fares on Route 100 are $20 each way and reservations are required. Airport employees can buy a 10 trip ticket for just $50 . Children 12 and under as well as seniors over the age of 65 are just $10 each way. This is a significant discount over the cab and shuttle fares currently charged in this market. All fares are payable in cash aboard the vehicle.
For more information on the new Staten Island-Newark Airport bus service, please visit our website at http://www.ewrbus.com . To make reservations, simply e-mail info@ewrbus.com .
TransportAzumah is a regional bus company that was formed in 2002 with the goal of improving mass transit by creating new links not presently served.
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/first-ever-staten-island-newark-airport-bus-service-to-launch-september-24-300146254.html
